data.title: Four countries for science (Journal Article)
data.meta_description: The U.S. Department of Energy's Office of Scientific and Technical Information
data.text:
A personal retrospect is given on four decades in science in four countries - the UK, France, Germany and the USA. Some historical observations are made together with a time transect through scientific systems and institutions in the four countries.

You are accessing a document from the Department of Energy's (DOE) OSTI.GOV. This site is a product of DOE's Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI) and is provided as a public service.

Visit OSTI to utilize additional information resources in energy science and technology.
